alert.note: Alert for Burke; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Burke, southeastern Richmond, Barnwell, Bamberg, south central Aiken and southern Orangeburg Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bamberg to 6 miles south of Jackson. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Barnwell, Savannah River Site, Plant Vogtle, Rivers Bridge State Park, Ehrhardt, Hilda, Snelling, Olar, Kline, Girard, Govan, Savannah River Site H Canyon, Bennock Mill, Savannah River Site K Complex, Shell Bluff Landing, and Barnwell County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
